summary: PROBLEM WITH THE A/C UNIT NOT STAYING COLD. ON LINE FOUND THAT GM KNEW ABOUT DEFECTIVE A/C UNITS BEFORE VEHICLES WERE EVEN TOUCHED THE DEALERS LOTS.TWO DEFECTIVE COMPONENTS-   (1)-LINE LEADING FROM THE COMPRESSOR TO THE CONDENSOR.(2)-DEFECTIVE AIR CONDITIONER CONDENSERS.SYSTEM WAS FILLED A/C RETURNED AFTER TWO DAYS WARM AGAIN-THIS A REPAIR THE DEALER SHOULD BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR AND TO HAVE REPAIRED WITH NO COST TO CUSTOMER.VEHICLE WAS TESTED BY ME STATIONARY AND AGAIN WHILE DRIVING .NOTICEABLE SMOKE COULD BE SEEN ON AND OFF WHEN TRUCK IS RUNNING BEING STATIONARY.
